thread.title: Hotel and Resort News: Music in Paris, Coffee Lessons in Orlando
thread.title_full: Hotel and Resort News: Music in Paris, Coffee Lessons in Orlando - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Hotel and Resort News: Music in Paris, Coffee Lessons in Orlando
text:
Our morning travel news digest, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
HOTELS WHERE BOOKS ARE HITS
Many hotels might be giving their attention to upgrading in-room technology, but a handful are going the old-fashioned route by creating in-room libraries.
The Castle Hill Inn in Newport , R.I., has recently partnered with a locally owned independent bookseller, Island Books, to stock rooms with five diverse titles including “The Vacationers” by Emma Straub and “The Martian” by Andy Weir (the latter is a novel about an astronaut who becomes one of the first people to walk on Mars).
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
